text: @senatemajldr You fcking liar. #Republicans have NEVER done the work for their constituents. You put a bunch of military pork into your counter proposal. @SpeakerPelosi & @SenateDems were right to block your BS. YOU are the ones refusing #COVID19 relief for the people who need it. FU
